Can I reset my testnet without restarting the testnet daemon?

No, you cannot reset your testnet without restarting the testnet daemon. After deleting the specified directories, you need to restart the testnet daemon (or relaunch Verus Desktop, deactivate verustest, and re-add verustest native) to complete the reset process.

## Testnet Reset
To reset your testnet make sure Verus is closed (and no testnet daemon running) and delete the following directories, then restart the testnet daemon (or relaunch Verus Desktop, deactivate verustest and re-add verustest native):
